law.catch_line: Reserve account, reimbursing employer account, pooled account, and annual payroll.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 266, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(23). -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 2. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 206, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4748g-3.
